item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: October 15th
item.content:encoded:
Oct 15, 2024
The Steam Deck Client Beta has been updated with the following changes:

General
  • Fixed a case where the Bluetooth settings tab would disappear if the system was in sleep mode for an extended period of time and resumed without an internet connection.
  • Re-enabled remote install from Steam client via the streaming dropdown.

Steam Input
  • Fixed an issue where bindings that were present from converting a configuration from one controller type to another could be active but not removable due to being filtered out of the binding interface.
Discuss on Steam

item.title: SteamOS 3.6.18 Beta: The Color at the End of the End of the Line
item.content:encoded:
Oct 11, 2024
Note: This update is for the Steam Deck Beta and Preview channels, and includes new features that are still being tested. You can opt into this in Settings > System > System Update Channel.

General
  • Fixed a possible crash when using Steam Deck as the Remote Play host
  • Fixed colorspace for Game Recording
  • Improved color range when using Remote Play to Steam Deck

item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: October 11th
item.content:encoded:
Oct 11, 2024
The Steam Deck Client Beta has been updated with the following changes:

Game Recording
  • Improved voice recording noise gate parameters for better recorded voice quality

Steam Input
  • SIAPI Glyphs for Playstation Dualsense are now monochrome to match Icons in Big Picture Mode

item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: October 10th
item.content:encoded:
Oct 10, 2024
The Steam Deck Client Beta has been updated with the following changes:

Game Recording
  • (Desktop Mode) Fixed issue where the overlay would be unresponsive in games which have Game Recording disabled

Steam Input
  • Fixed a case where Steam Deck personalization settings would get reset on device restart
  • Mode Shifts now support Track Pad Touch on DualSense/Edge, DualShock, SteamController and SteamDeck

Remote Play
  • Fixed black screen when streaming HEVC from Steam Deck

Discovery Queue
  • Improve the animation when scrolling through the discovery queue
Discuss on Steam

item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: October 8th
item.content:encoded:
Oct 8, 2024
The Steam Deck Client Beta has been updated with the following changes:

Broadcasting
  • Fixed a crash while broadcasting introduced in the last beta

Game Recording
  • Added error messages when trying to load a H265 clip or background recording w/ GPU acceleration or HW video decoding disabled

Steam Input
  • D-Pad directions and Right Joystick can now be used to activate Mode Shifts
  • Increased maximum sensitivity of Joystick Mouse mode.

Remote Play
  • Fixed the cursor being too small when streaming from a PC with desktop scaling enabled

Discovery Queue
  • Fixed the Discovery Queue presentation so that the elements around the videos show correctly.
